name: TDS - Tax Report
query: SELECT supplier, name, tax_withholding_category, taxes_and_charges_deducted FROM `tabPurchase Invoice`;
report_script:
Purchase Invoice: {{ doc.name }}

Supplier: {{ doc.supplier }}

Tax Withholding Category: {{ doc.get('tax_withholding_category') or doc.get('tax_withholding_category') }}

{%- for t in doc.get('taxes') or [] %} {%- if (t.get('charge_type') or '').lower() == 'actual' %} {%- endif %} {%- endfor %}
Charge Type Tax Description Amount
{{ t.get('charge_type') }} {{ t.get('description') or t.get('account_head') }} {{ "{:,.2f}".format(t.get('tax_amount') or t.get('rate') or 0) }}
